column4: hello, does ahnybody have experience with ipv6 on Ubuntu 10.04 server, please? IPV6 is working but after few minutes it stops and works again after /etc/init.d/networking restart
No, I wrote settings directly to interfaces file
have you tried it with autonconf see if it still cutso ut?
No I have not. I'm not sure how to use autoconf.
id ask in #ipv6 as theyd know more then in here
but how to tell the ip address to eth0 interface? With ifconfig?
I just looked at dmesg and see eth0: no IPv6 routers present but ping6 to ipv6.google.com works
keep a tail -f /var/log/messages (or similar) open see if it says anything when it cuts off
it seems that it iw working only if I leave ping6 ipv6.google.com running. After I terminate it, the connection is gone in a few seconds.
make sure ipv6 ping is enabled on ur box
